name: rmoimi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(w1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w1, w0)

comment: Restricted "at most one" is preserved through implication (note wff reversal). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2017.)
